summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 获取或设置元素内某一项的状态说明。

span.span: Gets or sets a description of the status of an item within an element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使客户端能够确定某个元素是否传达有关项的状态。This property enables a client to ascertain whether an element is conveying status about an item. 例如，与邮件应用程序中的联系人关联的项目可能是 "忙" 或 "已连接"。For example, an item associated with a contact in a messaging application might be "Busy" or "Connected". ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: UI Automation Properties Overview

Public Shared ReadOnly ItemStatusProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 获取或设置指定元素的类型说明。

span.span: Gets or sets a description of the type of the specified element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于获取有关列表、树视图或数据网格中的项的信息。This property is used to obtain information about items in a list, tree view, or data grid. 例如，文件目录视图中的项可以是 "文档文件" 或 "文件夹"。For example, an item in a file directory view might be a "Document File" or a "Folder". ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
